informal_proof: Because $\sqrt{25}<\sqrt{26}<\sqrt{27}<\sqrt{36}$, we have $\left\lceil\sqrt{27}\right\rceil=6$ and $\left\lfloor\sqrt{26}\right\rfloor=5$.  The expression thus evaluates to $6-5=1$.
formal_code:
(*

theory mathd_algebra_151 
  imports Complex_Main "HOL-Computational_Algebra.Computational_Algebra"
    "HOL-Number_Theory.Number_Theory"
begin

theorem mathd_algebra_151:
  shows "ceiling (sqrt 27) - floor (sqrt 26) = 1"
  sorry

end
